businessProfile.name: Burgers & Barley
businessProfile.address: 529 S 500 E Suite A, American Fork, UT 84003, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 529 S 500 E Suite A, American Fork, UT 84003, USA

reviews.text: My new favorite burger place. We have never eaten there because it‚Äôs small and busy. But the burgers are huge, great flavors and the fries are unlike any I have seen before. Delicious!

Wow, I got the Hot Pants burger which was so very excellent (although not spicy hot), the Home Fries which were perfectly crafted to scoop from my Chocolate Shake.   My wife got the Outlaw and loved it.  Service was excellent - this place is clearly managed very well.

This was a very satisfying meal experience.  Looking forward to returning and giving the Meat Man a go!  Do yourself a favor and drop in, you will not regret it

The bread they use made such a big difference in the hamburger, I might be biased being from Chile and a bread connoisseur (lol) but it made it a really good experience. A good variety of hamburger, I tried the Johnny and the Outlaw the last being my favorite, Johnny was great but too many flavors took away the rib eye flavor which is what I wanted to try. Overall a great experience and will definitely come again.

Impressed often enough, but seldom blown away.  This place blew me away.  Was welcomed like I was an old friend.  Very cheerful and helpful.  I ordered the Johnny burger with house fries.  They asked how I wanted the egg fried, which impressed me.  Not many places care enough to do that.  I chose over easy, which is not an easy way to prepare an egg and it came out perfectly.  The beef patty was so juicy and flavorful, and obviously not some pre-formed frozen patty.  The burger was a delicious mix of sweet, spicy, and savory, and I gobbled it down so fast I barely took a breath.  The burger was a good size, and the fries were an ample amount.  The fries are delicious.  They are the perfect balance of crispy on the outside and soft and pillowy on the inside.  The fry sauce is a little sweet and a little spicy.  I really liked it, but some may find it too different from typical fry sauce.  They have a cute little patio space with 6 or 7 two-top tables.  Pets are welcome on the patio for all the fur parents out there.  I highly recommend this place.  I'm excited to go back and try their other burgers.

Trust the reviews.
I ordered the Johnny. It was FANTASTIC!
My wife ordered the special, a peanut butter hamburger with jelly, bacon and jalapeno... It was fantastic.
Another person ordered the aloha and loved it!.
We also got the loaded french fries to share.
Those fries, their shape, are unique. We all talked about them.

I don't live anywhere in the area. If I did I'd be there all the time.
The owners were there too and they are super cool. Very friendly and inviting.
I wish them continued success.

recentReviews.text: Decent burger but wasn‚Äôt really what I wanted. The fries are good. I was the only one inside yet the order still seemed to take a long time.

These may be the best burgers I‚Äôve had in Utah. I just had the basic cooked medium with guac‚Ä¶. Ridoooonk! So juicy and rare. It was so delicious especially when paired with the Oreo shake, the salty and sweet contrast was amazing.
Perfect for date night or after a long hike.
Gosh it is so good, just gooooo!
One of the best places to get a burger. For those people saying, ‚ÄútHe BuRgErs ArE ToO mEsSy,‚Äù you obviously don‚Äôt frequent flavortown. Food is amazing and never disappoints.
Food was fantastic. The owners came out personal to check in. Very welcoming.

This is a fantastic burger joint, probably one of my favorites now! The portions were great and the flavor of these burgers were top notch. I got the Johnny (so so yummy) and my boyfriend chose the chef‚Äôs special, which to be honest sounded a little funky at first because it had peanut butter and jelly on it, but turned out to be amazing! We had to get fries of course. They were perfectly crispy and soft in the middle with some amazing dipping sauces on the side. The cashier was also super friendly and gave us a little run down since it was our first time in which was very nice :)
Las hamburguesas son deliciosas, elegimos good life y outlaw y no nos decepcionaron. Super recomendado
Hawaiian burger was delicious. Fries are very good!
Love the Gorgonzola Burger. Everything on the menu is great!

First time eating here, brought a large group and we all enjoyed the food, only complaint is how hot we were,  the HVAC didn‚Äôt seem to be working well, we had to eat quickly and leave due to how hot everyone was.

Perfect for date night or after a long hike.

detailedReviews.text: First time eating here, brought a large group and we all enjoyed the food, only complaint is how hot we were,  the HVAC didn‚Äôt seem to be working well, we had to eat quickly and leave due to how hot everyone was.

detailedReviews.author: Michal Gibson
detailedReviews.text: Delicious veggie burger! Will definitely go back.

detailedReviews.author: Vince Hindley
detailedReviews.text: Really good burgers. Steph was very friendly and super helpful

detailedReviews.author: John Bunderson
detailedReviews.text: The highlight is the beef. We got the weekend Brisket Chef's special and the Outlaw burger - medium well done. The bacon was perfectly crispy, homemade buns nicely toasted, and just the right amount of sauce to flavor, but not over power the beef patty. Also enjoyed the potato slices. Well done Burgers & Barley!

detailedReviews.author: Jim Oakerman
detailedReviews.text: My first time visiting this burger bar, and it was definitely a surprise. I like a good burger! This place didnt dissappoint! The burgers are sloppy and get all over everything! But definitely worth the sacrifice! My recommendation is to use as many napkins as you want! The burgers are so worth it!

detailedReviews.author: Leah Wynn
detailedReviews.text: Very yummy!

detailedReviews.author: S Wynn
detailedReviews.text:
Trust the reviews.
I ordered the Johnny. It was FANTASTIC!
My wife ordered the special, a peanut butter hamburger with jelly, bacon and jalapeno... It was fantastic.
Another person ordered the aloha and loved it!.
We also got the loaded french fries to share.
Those fries, their shape, are unique. We all talked about them.

I don't live anywhere in the area. If I did I'd be there all the time.
The owners were there too and they are super cool. Very friendly and inviting.
I wish them continued success.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Mcleod
detailedReviews.text: Got the Outlaw burger and cleaned the plate nice staff as well

detailedReviews.author: Chris Anderson
detailedReviews.text: Burgers & Barley has, by far, the Best burgers in Utah.  Everyone I've introduced to them agrees with me once they try it. I'm fond of the "Johnny" burger!!!!! And they make specialty burgers on Fridays! Try it, you'll it!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: aspen inouye
detailedReviews.text: Great burgers with great buns!!

detailedReviews.author: Mindy Hoffmann
detailedReviews.text: My new favorite burger place. We have never eaten there because it‚Äôs small and busy. But the burgers are huge, great flavors and the fries are unlike any I have seen before. Delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Daryl Harmon
detailedReviews.text: Their burgers are amazing and their fries are probably the best in town. The kind of quality you should expect from a $10+ burger.

detailedReviews.author: Bill Bateman
detailedReviews.text: Yum,  yum ,,, yummy

Excellent food !! The burger feel so good !!
The service good too !! So happy to found this place !!

detailedReviews.text: It's a burger joint.  It wasn't amazing, but got the job done.

detailedReviews.author: Facundo Gonzalez Huenchuguala
detailedReviews.text: I nuddedü§§

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Holliman
detailedReviews.text: A very good burger (I had the Hot Pants)  and home fries.

detailedReviews.author: Janet De Lara
detailedReviews.text: My burger was so good! I got the Outlaw. The service is also great. Everyone was very nice.

detailedReviews.author: Antonio G√≥mez
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely fantastic food. My burger was amazing. Add an outstanding service and this is truly a place to go eat.

detailedReviews.author: Lorenzo Parker
detailedReviews.text: None of the cheese was melted on the burger or even the grilled cheese. They toasted the bread and slapped American cheese in it. Not sure how they got such a great rating

detailedReviews.author: Stephen Jones
detailedReviews.text:
Great salad. I am not sure how they make any money on this salad. So much fruit here. I mean, there is a limit to which I will pay money for a salad regardless of the amount of fruit, but this is not there yet.
Good taste, good value and great service.
Come on down here and try a salad and a soda.
Maybe they should change the name. Salad and soda. Trademark pending.

detailedReviews.author: Connor
detailedReviews.text: Hamborgor slaps

detailedReviews.author: JP Mora
detailedReviews.text: The bread they use made such a big difference in the hamburger, I might be biased being from Chile and a bread connoisseur (lol) but it made it a really good experience. A good variety of hamburger, I tried the Johnny and the Outlaw the last being my favorite, Johnny was great but too many flavors took away the rib eye flavor which is what I wanted to try. Overall a great experience and will definitely come again.

detailedReviews.author: Herriman Guy
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic burger. Absolutely fresh and amazing. Highly recommend. The owner came out and talked to me for 15 minutes. He is a passionate artist when it comes to making great food.

detailedReviews.author: Philip Cochrane
detailedReviews.text: Hands down one of the best burgers in Utah! the Outlaw Burger is my favorite + the owner and staff are so welcoming and nice! Make sure to check them out!

detailedReviews.author: jeron gilbert
detailedReviews.text: First time visiting Burgers and Barley and I was blown away. It‚Äôs worth driving 30 minutes for their burgers and the staff that served me went above and beyond. I live in Magna and I will be back!

detailedReviews.author: Mike Ashcraft
detailedReviews.text: Impressed often enough, but seldom blown away.  This place blew me away.  Was welcomed like I was an old friend.  Very cheerful and helpful.  I ordered the Johnny burger with house fries.  They asked how I wanted the egg fried, which impressed me.  Not many places care enough to do that.  I chose over easy, which is not an easy way to prepare an egg and it came out perfectly.  The beef patty was so juicy and flavorful, and obviously not some pre-formed frozen patty.  The burger was a delicious mix of sweet, spicy, and savory, and I gobbled it down so fast I barely took a breath.  The burger was a good size, and the fries were an ample amount.  The fries are delicious.  They are the perfect balance of crispy on the outside and soft and pillowy on the inside.  The fry sauce is a little sweet and a little spicy.  I really liked it, but some may find it too different from typical fry sauce.  They have a cute little patio space with 6 or 7 two-top tables.  Pets are welcome on the patio for all the fur parents out there.  I highly recommend this place.  I'm excited to go back and try their other burgers.

detailedReviews.author: Katie Youngberg
detailedReviews.text: Best burger I have ever had, accompanied by excellent service. The man who owns the place cares deeply about every customer, and you can feel it there. He makes an effort to come talk to you at your table and it‚Äôs so sweet. Highly recommend burgers and barley for the crazy good burgers and the excellent family feeling service.

detailedReviews.author: Tyson Johnson
detailedReviews.text: This place was super good! I would highly recommend this place!

detailedReviews.author: Neal Welch
detailedReviews.text:
Burgers and Barley in Pleasant Grove is an absolute gem! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm welcome and an inviting atmosphere that set the stage for an amazing dining experience.

The burgers? Phenomenal! Perfectly cooked, packed with flavor, and served with fresh, high-quality ingredients that make every bite memorable. Whether you're a classic cheeseburger fan or looking for something more adventurous, they‚Äôve got options that hit the spot. And let's talk about the fries‚Äîcrispy, golden perfection that pairs beautifully with their selection of sauces.

The service was top-notch. The staff was friendly, attentive, and genuinely cared about making sure every guest had an exceptional experience. My order was taken promptly, the food arrived fresh and hot, and the entire experience felt effortless.

Burgers and Barley is the kind of place that keeps you coming back, whether for a casual night out or a meal that satisfies every craving.

detailedReviews.author: denys lovelett
detailedReviews.text: The burgers and fries are amazing!! Flavors are the bomb!! A hidden gem!! Will definitely be back!! We ordered the Aloha and the Outlaw burger w/fries did not disappoint!!! Yummy! Yummy!!

detailedReviews.author: Shauna Alexander
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a Caesar and it was the worst $10 salad I've paid for. Dressing is on the side, didn't come with chicken, had cherry tomatoes, croutons and lettuce. Very disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Makaila Malungahu
detailedReviews.text: Everything was GREAT about this place. Best burger I had in a long time! It was really cool that the owner also came out and was interacting with everyone to check on our experience. Excellent food, service, and atmosphere! New fav burger place for sure! ü§ôüèΩ

detailedReviews.author: Stokes Window Cleaning
detailedReviews.text: These burgers are so good. The bun and fries stand out especially. Love the beer selection as well.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Weisenburger
detailedReviews.text: Best burger in town. With or without the bun. If you love fries, these will blow your mind. I'm never disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Edwards
detailedReviews.text: This place is GREAT. Had the meat man and was not disappointed. Friendly staff. Worth every penny.

detailedReviews.author: Spencer Hansen
detailedReviews.text: We got the Good Life and the Gorgonzola burgers with fries and they were both excellent. So much flavor! The food was served quickly and everything was hot and delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Noemi Garcia
detailedReviews.text: Burgers taste amazing! Best burger I‚Äôve ever had! Highly recommend!!

detailedReviews.author: Braydon Peterson
detailedReviews.text: The food was amazing and they were able to handle our massive family efficiently. We for sure will come back when we are around.

detailedReviews.author: Natasha Rogers
detailedReviews.text: Delicious buns, dripping with condiments and sauce, crispy patty - just how I want my burgers! Yummy friends and friendly staff.

detailedReviews.author: Ruslan Cosovan
detailedReviews.text: Amazing overall, food is great and service is excellent and quick. Fireüî•

detailedReviews.author: val ben
detailedReviews.text: Their food is fire, great customer care, quick, best food of my life, highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Dmitriy Bachkala
detailedReviews.text: Literally the best burger I have ever had. Will definitely be returning! I had the Aloha burger and it was divine! If you like Hawaiian-style food, I'd recommend that one.

detailedReviews.author: Paul Bachkala
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely delicious burger!

detailedReviews.author: Hyrum Oliphant
detailedReviews.text: Very good food, very friendly staff.

detailedReviews.author: Olivia Griffith
detailedReviews.text: I loved this place and the food was yummy, and well done! However my one complaint which is why its rating is low, they only give you dinky ketchup packets. And it‚Äôs especially frustrating when they deliver fry sauce in a perfect container for dipping but discriminate  towards ketchup.

detailedReviews.author: Paul Graham
detailedReviews.text:
Wow, I got the Hot Pants burger which was so very excellent (although not spicy hot), the Home Fries which were perfectly crafted to scoop from my Chocolate Shake.   My wife got the Outlaw and loved it.  Service was excellent - this place is clearly managed very well.

This was a very satisfying meal experience.  Looking forward to returning and giving the Meat Man a go!  Do yourself a favor and drop in, you will not regret it

detailedReviews.author: Dr. L McConnell
detailedReviews.text: Delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Josh Reed
detailedReviews.text: Came from out of town and came with an appetite but left full. Burger was massive but messy so plan your outfit accordingly.

detailedReviews.author: Crisandra Hamilton
detailedReviews.text: One of the best burgers I have had! We also had frutta salad. Oh my, lots of goodies on it but the dressing is so delicious and you can tell it‚Äôs freshly made. This place won‚Äôt disappoint!

detailedReviews.author: Tanner Perkins
detailedReviews.text: One of my favorite burgers of all time. You need these burgers!

detailedReviews.author: Breqlynn Coombs
detailedReviews.text: THE BEST PLACE OF MY ENTIRE LIFE!! Good service, clean place. And THE BEST BURGER!! I got the aloha!! Everything was good about this place

detailedReviews.author: Josh Kelson
detailedReviews.text: Amazing burgers, possibly the best in Utah country. Will travel to eat, but Closed on Sunday though?? Kind of missing your target market in my opinion. Please open on Sunday.

detailedReviews.author: Loren
detailedReviews.text: This time I had the Aloha burger, it was amazing! The Oreo shake was great too!

detailedReviews.author: Arash R
detailedReviews.text: Delicious burgers, highly recommend the Aloha

detailedReviews.author: Nico Souza
detailedReviews.text: Stop scrolling and go to Burgers & Barley now! First time there and I‚Äôm impressed! Great burger, delicious fries, great atmosphere. Great for groups, dating, family‚Ä¶ just go!

detailedReviews.author: Camille Purtschert
detailedReviews.text:
Oh my goodness, I LOVE this restaurant so much!! Their food is the bomb... All made from scratch and seriously, I went "mm mm" after every bite! And since I can't have bread currently, (though their buns are flipping delicious)they have a fabulous lettuce wrap, and you can also have gluten free options. Amazing.

Have I mentioned their fries? What the heck?! How can fries be so good!! Love love love. We even tried their chocolate Oreo shake... And yes, perfection. What else would you expect? I love that it wasn't ginormous, too! Perfect little dessert.

You can watch sports while you eat, and the owner comes out and talks to you personally and asks how things are. Very kind, generous and an amazing cook. Love that personal touch. Go go go!!

I meant to take pictures but the good was so dang good I forgot! Trust me, you won't regret it.

Oh and apparently they have great draft beers? I wouldn't know since I don't drink, but it's in their name, so yeah. Ha

detailedReviews.author: Serhii Tyshchenko
detailedReviews.text: They have very good burgers üçî üòã üëå

detailedReviews.author: Britt Orgill
detailedReviews.text: The staff was so kind. The food was unbelievably yummy

detailedReviews.author: Bailey P
detailedReviews.text: Best burger i've ever had in utah, YOU MUST GO HERE. Super fast, and the employees are so friendly. JUST DO IT!!

detailedReviews.author: Mabel Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Delicious, really great burger. The wait staff is also extremely friendly! Will for sure come back.

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Lambert
detailedReviews.text:
I came here with a friend and both of us really liked our burgers. He got the Outlaw and I got the Good Life. The burgers were large, juicy, messy, and delicious! The fries are sized like potato chips but are thick like steak fries. I thought they were decent.

Update: I came back with my wife and we tried the Meat Man and the Johnny and both of those were also fantastic! Between the two I've had I'd rate the Meat Man as better but you really can't go wrong with either.

detailedReviews.author: jayne coovert
detailedReviews.text: Excellent burger joint!! If I wasn‚Äôt moving out of state I would be a regular! Cali burger was the best veggie burger I‚Äôve had in years, and house made fry sauce and ranch are amazing as well. Definitely recommend (:

detailedReviews.author: sarah kettle
detailedReviews.text: We got the basic burger, and spudalicious fries, both were really good! The burger was cooked perfectly and the veggies were very fresh! We really enjoyed the fries. Our food came out really quick as well. All of the employees were very kind and helpful. Definitely recommend trying it out!

detailedReviews.author: BJ Patterson
detailedReviews.text: Burgers & Barley is one of the best spots to get a gourmet burger cooked to your choice from medium to well done. Fresh ingredients and thick fries. Great craft beer aswell!

detailedReviews.author: Hershal Hall
detailedReviews.text: Magali was the best!! Food was great and I had the Meat man burger!!

detailedReviews.author: Zachary Patterson
detailedReviews.text: Solid stuff.

detailedReviews.author: Phoebe
detailedReviews.text: These burgers are top notch! Great sizes, crispy fries, and the service is friendly and attentive. The burgers are just enough to fill you up, not too heavy, and yet super delicious. The place is neat and bathrooms are clean.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the unique and flavorful specialty burgers, such as the Johnny and the peanut butter and jelly burger, which keep them coming back for more. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The fries are a standout, with a unique shape and perfect balance of crispy and soft texture, often described as the best in town. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The friendly and welcoming atmosphere, with owners and staff personally engaging with customers, creates a memorable dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times despite low customer volume - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews regarding food quality and presentation (e.g., unmelted cheese, disappointing salad) - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness (e.g., HVAC issues causing discomfort) - social media marketing can improve this area

Perfect for date night or after a long hike.
Gosh it is so good, just gooooo!
